titleStmt.title: The city-madam a comedie, as it was acted at the private house in Black Friers with great applause / written by Phillip Massinger, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
Pennycuicke, Andrew, b. 1620.

notesStmt.note: Dedication "To the truly noble and virtuous Lady Ann, Countess of Oxford" by Andrew Pennycuicke.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
